ygData.subject: Ascension Of 4 Beings From The Dimension Of Elements
ygData.msgSnippet: ... A spy, warrior and wizard were being created in the Dimension of Elements, a place connected with the Abyss.  These were not just more ordinary spies,

::An Element Worker/An Element Spy/An Element Warrior/An Element Magic Warr=
ior(An Element Wizard would be a more general name)::

            A spy, w=
arrior and wizard were being created in the Dimension of Elements, a place =
connected with the Abyss.  These were not just more ordinary spies, warrior=
s and wizards, these were special ones.  They were being sent to Earth itse=
lf, accompanied by a main worker, which could not be given special powers, =
or else that would seem to farfetched, for a worker to have special abiliti=
es.  This team was now ready.  The spy, the warrior and the wizard all met =
at a certain spot, where everyone was, to say goodbye.

       The worker w=
as there too, waiting.

      Oh, yes, the names.  I forgot to tell you the=
 names.  There's Covertax, the spy.  Then there's Alvatar, the warrior, Rin=
galish=E9, the wizard, and finally, Dernio, the worker.

        They said =
their goodbyes, recieved good lucks, and left.  They warped to a random pla=
ce on Earth.

       Everything went dark, then, they appeared.

       Hmm=
.......They landed in a nice place.  There was lots of trees for shade, exc=
pe tone spot with an opening for sunlight, and a freshwater stream.  The tw=
eeting of birds could be heard.  That beautiful sound.  It was nice to get =
away from the Dimension of Elements for a while.

           "Ok, listen up=
, this is an excellent place to settle, so we'll stay here," Ringalish=E9 d=
eclared.

         They all agreed.  It was a great place to settle.

     =
  "Ok, Dernio, you know what to do!!" Ringalish=E9 said to Dernio, nodding.=


        Dernio nodded back.

       "I'll get on it!!!" He said, going to=
 the spot with sunlight.

        He looked back.

        "Hey, this is a =
good spot for a plant command center, should I build a plant command center=
??" Dernio asked.

        Ringalish=E9 nodded.

        "Yes, a plant comm=
and center it is.  You know, most of our base should be plant based, Dernio=
," He said.

          Dernio nodded back, and began constructing a plant c=
ommand center.

         While that was happening, Ringalish=E9, Covertax a=
nd Alvatar were taking a break.

         "You know, maybe we should check =
out these transformer beings that the Abyss keeps talking about soon," Cove=
rtax said.

         "Yes, we will, but remember, don't start to make them =
your enemies, just because the Abyss doesn't like them doesn't mean we must=
n't like them," Ringalish=E9 said.

        Alvatar stepped in the conversa=
tion.

        "But if we treat them as friends, it might endanger our alli=
ance with the Abyss!!" He exclaimed.

        Ringalish=E9 just gave a litt=
le smile.

      "Don't worry, if the Abyss decide they can not trust us, w=
e shall regain their trust," He said.

         Ringalish=E9 walked away.

=
        Hahaha..........The Dimension of Elements had a little surprise bre=
wing for the Abyss..........A big surprise.........Just then, his mind went=
 back to Earth, as he heard Dernio shout, "Command center ready!"

       R=
ingalish=E9 turned to Dernio, and walked towards him.

      "Good work Der=
nio.  Now, don't plan on building a plant barrack just yet, we might need t=
o scout out the area before getting soldiers.  We don't know if we have to =
fight.  Now, your job Dernio, is just-" Ringalish=E9 was cut off by Dernio.=


       "To go and mine plant resources??" Dernio said.

        Ringalish=
=E9 just nodded again.

        Dernio went and mined off the trees and gra=
ss, accompanied by another worker named Kronia produced from the plant comm=
and center.

        "We have all we need for now," Ringalish=E9 announced.=
  

       Alvatar just patrolled the area, while Covertax rested.  Ringali=
sh=E9 was meditating quietly in a shady spot.  Dernio and Kronia continued =
doing their job, all night through, like all workers.

(Don't worry, I won'=
t take advantage of having a base, workers etc. and all that stuff resembli=
ng Real Time Strategy games)
